Clara Marie Prudler

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Henry Erdman
  3. Location of Family: Unknown
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Humboldt, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1893-02-16
  8. Date of Death: 1978-04-09
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Clara Phillips
  11. Spouse Name: Stanley E. Phillips
  12. Notes: First husband's name John C. Peglow. First marriage July 10, 1918. Humboldt Standard, 9 February 1894, p. 8 attached.
  13. Source: OTR 295; Multiple name Corres. - scrapbook - name and address; Eloise Thomsen Corres.
